de.fraunhofer.fokus.ants.jipfix
Class jIPFIX

java.lang.Object
  de.fraunhofer.fokus.ants.jipfix.jIPFIX
All Implemented Interfaces:
de.fraunhofer.fokus.ants.jipfix.IPFIXRawCollectorListener, de.fraunhofer.fokus.ants.jipfix.MPollLoopExitListener
public class jIPFIX
extends java.lang.Object
implements de.fraunhofer.fokus.ants.jipfix.MPollLoopExitListener, de.fraunhofer.fokus.ants.jipfix.IPFIXRawCollectorListener

An utility wrapper intended to control the FOKUS libipfix library from Java.

jIPFIX

Method Detail

initCollector

public void initCollector(IPFIXCollectorListener listen)
initialize an IPFIX Collector which invokes callback functions on interesting events.

Parameters:
listen - an IPFIXCollectorListener implementing the callback functions.

initFileCollector

public void initFileCollector(java.io.File directory)
initialize an IPFIX Collector which writes its information into files.

Parameters:
directory - a base directory to write information in.

startCollector

public void startCollector(int proto,
                           int port,
                           int family,
                           int maxcon,
                           int duration)
start collecting IPFIX messages.

Parameters:
proto - IPFIX protocol to use, e.g. IPFIX_PROTO_SCTP
port - Server port to listen on
family - Consider this network address family, e.g. AF_INET for IPv4
maxcon - Maximum number of accepted connections.
duration - listen for this many seconds or -1 for infinite.

stopCollector

public void stopCollector()
stop collecting IPFIX messages.

getSourceByID

public IPFIXSNode getSourceByID(long odid)
retreive available information for a specific source identifier

Parameters:
odid - the source identifier
Returns:
a source (SNode) object

getTemplateByID

public IPFIXTNode getTemplateByID(int tid)
retreive available information for a specific template identifier

Parameters:
tid - the template identifier
Returns:
a template (TNode) object

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
start a simple exampleCollecter that does nothing.
